ComicInfo.Title: You Only Die Twice
ComicInfo.Summary: You Only Die Twice: Deadpool tracks down Arnim Zola and has to take on a horde of clones he has created of the lamest dead folks the Marvel Universe has to offer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 18:13:37. [CVDB105552] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 16:03:51. [Issue ID 278266]
